Reviews.Title: Get a real camera or use your iPhone.
Reviews.Author: gt3ch
Reviews.Content: I was hoping this would be an upgrade over the front-facing camera in my iPhone.  It isn't.  Picture quality is awful and very unflattering.  You need terrific light and to do a lot of tweaking to get almost acceptable pictures.  All the included apps run painfully slow and are of limited usefulness.  most picture uploading scales the picture down dramatically.  The included accessories with this kit are garbage.

ProductInfo.Features:
Flip-out Display
WIFI Connectivity w/ Smart Link Button
3.3 Amoled Touchscreen
16.3M BSI CMOS Sensor
5X Zoom/F2.5 25mm Lens/16.3 Mega Pixels
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung MV900F Multiview Smart W/ Wi-Fi Digital Camera in Black + 8GB Accessory Kit
